clauses.clause_text: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the applicable jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

Neither Party shall be liable for failure or delay in performance under this Agreement due to events beyond reasonable control, including acts of God, war, terrorism, labor disputes, pandemics, or governmental actions.
Failure by either Party to enforce any provision of this Agreement shall not constitute a waiver of future enforcement of that or any other provision.
Either Party may terminate this Agreement by providing written notice in accordance with the notice period specified herein or immediately in the event of material breach.
During the term of employment and for a specified period thereafter, the Employee shall not engage in any competing business activities as permitted under applicable law.
The Employee shall faithfully perform duties assigned by the Company and comply with all applicable policies, procedures, and lawful instructions.

Confidential Information includes all non-public information disclosed by either Party, whether orally, in writing, or electronically, that is designated as confidential or reasonably understood to be confidential.
Confidential Information shall not include information that is publicly available, independently developed, or lawfully received from a third party without breach of obligation.
The obligations of confidentiality shall survive termination of this Agreement for a period of five (5) years unless otherwise required by law.
The Service Provider agrees to perform the services described in this Agreement in a professional and workmanlike manner.
The Client shall pay the Service Provider fees as specified in this Agreement within the agreed payment timeline.
Nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed to create an employer-employee, partnership, or joint venture relationship between the Parties.
The Tenant agrees to pay rent and a refundable security deposit as specified in this Agreement.
The Tenant shall maintain the premises in good condition, subject to normal wear and tear.
The Company grants the Customer a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the software during the term of this Agreement.
Each Party agrees to comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures.
In no event shall either Party be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of this Agreement.
